      • subscribeForLocationBasedGeofences

        public void subscribeForLocationBasedGeofences()
                                        throws CNIException
        Description copied from interface: CNIGeofenceManager
        Subscribe to location changes to update geofences. Location updates will happen once per hour or when distance changes for mote than 5km

      • unsubscribeFromLocationBasedGeofences

        public void unsubscribeFromLocationBasedGeofences()
        Description copied from interface: CNIGeofenceManager
